interestingFact: The United States has the world's largest economy.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest on Earth.
India is the world’s most populous country as of 2023.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only remaining wonder of the ancient world.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
